mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_CART(PRODUCT_CART_NO, UNO, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_COUNT) VALUES(PRODUCT_CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uno}, #{productId}, #{productCount})
mapper.select: SELECT C.PRODUCT_CART_NO, C.UNO, C.PRODUCT_ID, C.PRODUCT_COUNT, P.PRODUCT_TITLE, P.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_CART C LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_BOARD P ON C.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USERINFO U ON C.UNO = U.UNO WHERE U.UNO =#{uno}
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_CART WHERE UNO = #{uno} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
